Class LocomotiveController

public class LocomotiveController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class takes care of HTTP GET requests and sends responses.

      • api

        @GetMapping(value="/api",
            produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public java.lang.String api(@RequestParam(value="locomotive",required=false)
                                                                                                               java.lang.String locomotive,
                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        HTTP mapping for /api which sends the JSON output for the requested locomotive full number.
        Parameters:
        locomotive - locomotive full number (8 digits). Example: 11426061
        request - HTTP request
        response - HTTP response
        Returns:
        response body
